title: Dmitry Sergeyev (footballer)
text:
Dmitry Sergeyevich Sergeyev (; born 3 April 2000) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who plays for <a href="FC%20Zenit-2%20Saint%20Petersburg">FC Zenit-2 Saint Petersburg</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut for <a href="FC%20Zenit-2%20Saint%20Petersburg">Zenit-2 Saint Petersburg</a> in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">FNL</a> on 4 August 2018 in a game vs <a href="FC%20Tom%20Tomsk">Tom Tomsk</a>.
On 23 June 2021, he joined <a href="FC%20Baltika%20Kaliningrad">FC Baltika Kaliningrad</a> on loan.
